scripts.help: echo "test | create | update | update | delete | monitor | stats"
scripts.create: aws cloudformation create-stack --stack-name subatomic-rest-api-example --template-body file://rest-api.yml --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM
scripts.update: aws cloudformation update-stack --stack-name subatomic-rest-api-example --template-body file://rest-api.yml --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM
